mapper.sql: video_num, video_name, video_theme, video_image, video_file, video_file_origin, video_image_origin
mapper.select:
select video_num videoNum, video_name videoName, video_theme videoTheme, video_image videoImage, video_file videoFile, video_file_origin videoFileOrigin, video_image_origin videoImageOrigin from video
video_num = #{videoNum}
select 1 from bookmark where video_num= #{arg0} and mem_num = #{arg1}
